TopicTitle: RemoteTech: Still have control without signal

Articles.Content: I am running RemoteTech in 1.4.5 along with RO, RSS, Kerbalism, and most of their recommendations (according to CKAN). I launched an unmanned craft (run by the Aerobee Probe Core) and was surprised to find that I still had control of it as it flew over the pacific - with no connection. I understand remotetech to be disabling all of the stock commnet options -- has anyone seen this before or know what the problem might be?
